title: Bug 116744: Dynamic text content type has no effect
OB: When setting the dynamic text element's Content Type property to Auto, Plain, or HTML, the report displays the same results. Regardless of the content type set, the displayed results are not in accordance with the expected behavior.
EB:
The expected results are as follows:

- For Plain content type, the literal content (including tags) should be displayed.
- For Auto content type, content 1, 2, and 3 should appear properly without HTML or RTF tags.
- For HTML content type, content 1 and 2 should appear properly without HTML tags, and content 3 should appear literally with RTF tags. Please refer to the attached report for more details.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:

1. Prepare a database field with three types of content:
   a) HTML text within <html>...</html> tags
   b) HTML fragments not within <html> tags
   c) Text with RTF tags
2. Use a dynamic text element to display the contents of this field in a report.
